TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoginStatus extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl

summary.span: 检测用户的身份验证状态，将 Web 站点的链接状态切换为登录或注销。

span.span: Detects the user's authentication state and toggles the state of a link to log in to or log out of a Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件具有两种状态：登录到网站并从网站注销，由 对象的 属性的 属性确定。The control has two states, logged in to the Web site and logged out of the Web site, determined by the property of the object's property. 控件显示文本或图像链接，具体取决于 和 属性的设置。The control displays either a text or an image link, depending on the setting of the and properties. 可以显示一种或两种状态的文本或图像。You can display either text or images for one or both states. > [!NOTE] > 如果你不熟悉 ASP.NET 中提供的登录控件集，请参阅[ASP.NET Login Controls 概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178329(v=vs.100))，然后继续。If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178329(v=vs.100)) before continuing. 有关与登录控件和成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员身份管理用户](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/tw292whz(v=vs.100))。For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/tw292whz(v=vs.100)). 如果用户未登录到站点，则 控件将提供应用程序配置设置中定义的登录页的链接。When a user is not logged in to the site, the control provides a link to the login page defined in the application configuration settings. 当用户登录到网站时， 控件提供了一个用于从网站注销的链接。When the user is logged in to the Web site, the control provides a link to log out of the Web site. 从网站注销将清除用户的身份验证状态，并且在使用 cookie 时，将从用户的客户端计算机中清除 cookie。Logging out of the Web site clears the user's authentication status and when using cookies will clear the cookie from the user's client computer. 在对网站进行任何后续访问时， 控件将显示登录提示。On any subsequent visit to the Web site, the control will display the prompt to log in. 注销行为由 属性控制，该属性指定是刷新当前页面、将用户重定向到应用程序配置设置中定义的登录页，还是将用户重定向到 属性指定的页面。The logout behavior is controlled by the property, which specifies whether to refresh the current page, redirect the user to the login page defined in the application configuration settings, or redirect the user to a page specified by the property. 默认值为刷新当前页面。The default is to refresh the current page. > [!NOTE] > 当用户使用 控件从网站注销时，视图状态中显示的所有数据以及所有 post 数据都将丢失。When a user uses the control to log out of a Web site, all data present in view state and all post data is lost. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ```

summary.span: 创建构成 控件的子控件。

span.span: Creates the child controls that make up the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当从 类派生自定义控件时，此成员主要由控件开发人员使用。This member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom control from the class. ASP.NET 基础结构调用此方法，通知任何使用基于撰写的实现的控件，包括从 和 派生的控件，以创建它们所包含的任何子控件，以便为回发或呈现做准备。This method is called by the ASP.NET infrastructure to notify any controls that use composition-based implementation, including controls that derive from and , to create any child controls they contain in preparation for postback or rendering.

span.span: ASP.NET Login Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public event EventHandler LoggedOut;
.event class System.EventHandler LoggedOut
Public Custom Event LoggedOut As EventHandler
public: event EventHandler ^ LoggedOut;
member this.LoggedOut : EventHandler

summary.span: 在用户单击注销链接并且注销过程完成后引发。

span.span: Raised after the user clicks the logout link and the logout process is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户单击注销链接并且注销过程完成后，服务器上将引发 事件。The event is raised on the server after the user clicks the logout link and the logout process is complete. 当用户单击 "注销" 链接时，将引发 事件，然后运行注销进程，最后引发 事件。When the user clicks the logout link, the event is raised, then the logout process is run, and finally the event is raised. 使用 事件可提供其他处理，例如，在用户从网站注销后清理数据库连接或删除每用户缓存的数据。Use the event to provide additional processing such as cleaning up database connections or removing per-user cached data after the user logs out of a Web site. 当 事件正在执行时，用户的标识仍可用。The user's identity is still available while the event is executing. 如果 事件的处理程序将客户端浏览器重定向到另一页，则将从客户端清除身份验证 cookie。If your handler for the event redirects the client browser to another page, the authentication cookie will be cleared from the client. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个事件处理程序附加到 事件。The following code example attaches an event handler to the event. 在此示例中，事件处理程序为空。The event handler in this example is empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusAfterLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusAfterLogout/CS/loginstatusafterlogoutcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusAfterLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusAfterLogout/VB/loginstatusafterlogoutvb.aspx#1)]

Public Custom Event LoggingOut As LoginCancelEventHandler
public: event System::Web::UI::WebControls::LoginCancelEventHandler ^ LoggingOut;
member this.LoggingOut : System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventHandler

summary.span: 在用户单击注销按钮时引发。

span.span: Raised when the user clicks the logout button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击 "注销" 链接时，将在服务器上引发 事件。The event is raised on the server when the user clicks the logout link. 注销过程不会发生在此事件之后，并且用户信息仍可用。The logout process does not occur until after this event, and user information is still available. 如果用户必须在离开网站之前完成某个活动（例如，在购物车中购买商品或将更改提交到数据库），则 事件允许您取消注销过程。The event allows you to cancel the logout process if the user must complete an activity before leaving the Web site, such as purchasing items in a shopping cart or submitting changes to a database. 可以通过将 参数的 属性设置为 `true`来取消 事件。You can cancel the event by setting the property of the parameter to `true`. 使用 事件可在用户注销站点之前提供其他处理，如清除每用户数据。Use the event to provide additional processing, such as clearing per-user data, before a user logs out of a site. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个事件处理程序附加到 事件。The following code example attaches an event handler to the event. 该事件处理程序更新窗体上的字段，然后取消注销尝试。The event handler updates a field on the form, and then cancels the logout attempt. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusBeforeLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusBeforeLogout/CS/loginstatusbeforelogoutcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusBeforeLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusBeforeLogout/VB/loginstatusbeforelogoutvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于登录链接的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the image used for the login link.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串包含用于登录链接的图像的 URL。

span.span: A string containing the URL of the image used for the login link.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含用于登录链接的图像的位置。The property contains the location of the image used for the login link. 属性用作图像的替代文本。The property is used as the alternative text for the image. 如果 为空，则 属性呈现为链接。If is empty, the property is rendered as the link. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 属性设置为特定图像。The following code example shows how to set the property to a specific image. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusLoginImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLoginImageUrl/CS/loginstatusloginimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusLoginImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLoginImageUrl/VB/loginstatusloginimageurlvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于登录链接的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text used for the login link.

value.span: 显示为登录链接的字符串。

span.span: A string displayed as the login link.
The default is "Login".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性为空时， 属性将显示为链接文本。The property is displayed as the link text when the property is empty. 当 属性包含链接时， 属性将用作图像的替代文本。When the property contains a link, the property is used as the alternative text for the image. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 属性。The following code example shows how to set the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusLoginText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLoginText/CS/loginstatuslogintextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusLoginText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLoginText/VB/loginstatuslogintextvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值用于确定在用户使用 控件从网站注销时所执行的操作。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines the action taken when a user logs out of a Web site with the control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定用户使用 控件注销时向用户显示的页面。The property determines which page is presented to the user when he or she logs out using the control. 下表描述了对每个 值执行的操作。The following table describes the actions taken for each value. | 值 value|执行的操作Action taken| |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------| ||将用户重定向到 属性中包含的 URL。Redirects the user to the URL contained in the property. 如果 为空，则将用户重定向到应用程序配置设置中定义的登录页。If is empty, the user is redirected to the login page defined in the application configuration settings.| ||将用户重定向到应用程序配置设置中定义的登录页。Redirects the user to the login page defined in the application configuration settings.| ||刷新当前页。Refreshes the current page.| 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为 值，以便将用户发送到登录页。The following code example sets the property to the value to send the user to the login page. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusLogoutAction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLogoutAction/CS/loginstatuslogoutactioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusLogoutAction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLogoutAction/VB/loginstatuslogoutactionvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 该属性设置为无效的 值。

span.span: The property is set to an invalid value.
ASP.NET Login Controls Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为 时，会将用户重定向到 中包含的 URL。When the property is set to , the user is redirected to the URL contained in . 如果 设置为任何其他值，将忽略 属性的内容。If is set to any other value, the contents of the property are ignored. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为注销页，将 属性设置为 以便在注销时重定向用户。The following code example sets the property to a logout page and the property to so that the user is redirected when logging out. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusLogoutPageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLogoutPageUrl/CS/loginstatuslogoutpageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusLogoutPageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLogoutPageUrl/VB/loginstatuslogoutpageurlvb.aspx#1)]

The default is "Logout".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性为空时，将显示 属性。The property is displayed when the property is empty. 当 属性包含链接时， 属性将用作不支持图像的浏览器中的图像的替代文本。When the property contains a link, the property is used as the alternative text for the image in browsers that do not support images. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 属性。The following code example shows how to set the property. span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 在用户单击注销链接并且注销处理完成后引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event after the user clicks the logout link and logout processing is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 事件来提供其他处理，如在用户注销网站后关闭数据库连接或清理每用户缓存的数据。Use the event to provide additional processing, such as closing database connections or cleaning up per-user cached data, after the user has logged out of a Web site. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个事件处理程序附加到 事件。The following code example attaches an event handler to the event. 在此示例中，事件处理程序为空。The event handler in this example is empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusAfterLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusAfterLogout/CS/loginstatusafterlogoutcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusAfterLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusAfterLogout/VB/loginstatusafterlogoutvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
ASP.NET Login Controls Overview

span.span: A that contains event data.

summary.span: 在用户单击 控件上的注销链接时将引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event when a user clicks the logout link on the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 事件可在用户注销站点之前提供其他处理，如清理每用户数据。Use the event to provide additional processing, such as cleaning up per-user data, before a user logs out of a site. 可以取消 事件，使用户可以选择在离开网站之前保存购物车或数据库更改等数据。The event can be canceled, so you can give the user the option of saving data such as a shopping cart or database changes before leaving the Web site. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个事件处理程序附加到 事件。The following code example attaches an event handler to the event. 该事件处理程序更新窗体上的字段，然后取消注销尝试。The event handler updates a field on the form, and then cancels the logout attempt. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusBeforeLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusBeforeLogout/CS/loginstatusbeforelogoutcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusBeforeLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusBeforeLogout/VB/loginstatusbeforelogoutvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
ASP.NET Login Controls Overview

summary.span: 确定用户是否已登录，并获取登录页的 URL。

span.span: Determines whether a user is logged in, and gets the URL of the login page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通过检查 对象的 属性的 属性来确定用户是否已登录。The method determines whether the user is logged in by examining the property of the object's property. 如果用户已登录，则使用 或 属性呈现控件。If the user is logged in, the or property is used to render the control. 如果用户未登录，则使用 或 属性呈现控件。If the user is not logged in, the or property is used to render the control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
ASP.NET Login Controls Overview

summary.span: 获取 控件的 值。

span.span: Gets the value for the control.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许输出流写入 控件的相应 HTML 标记。The property allows the output stream to write the appropriate HTML markup for the control. 属性主要由控件开发人员使用。The property is used primarily by control developers.

para.span: 可以重写此属性，以指定要用于派生控件的 值。

span.span: You can override this property to specify which value to use for your derived control.
ASP.NET Login Controls Overview
